channel.title: Pleased to meet you
channel.description:
Hi everyone. My name is Jason and I'm an artist / independent product designer, solopreneur and Chief Happiness Officer (CHO). A smattering of my work is @ http://jasoncomely.com
I'm working on half a dozen projects right now. Some have a practical application and others are flat out weird. I may ask for insights regarding them in the nearish future.
Nice to meet you all.
